q_ch: 在我们的所有仓库中，库存不为0的原材料有哪些，整理成{类型：剩余数量}的形式。
q_en: What are the raw materials with non zero inventory in all of our warehouses, organized in the form of 'Type: Remaining Quantity'?
gt:
Sure thing! Let's take a look at the raw materials with non-zero inventory in all of our warehouses. Here's the organized list in the form of 'Type: Remaining Quantity':

| Type              | Remaining Quantity |
|-------------------|--------------------|
| Cotton Fabric     | 3500               |
| Wool              | 4100               |
| Silk              | 1100               |
| Leather           | 2200               |
| Synthetic Fiber   | 2300               |
| Denim Fabric      | 4500               |
| Down              | 1230               |
| Down Pieces       | 2420               |

Isn't it great to see all these materials ready to go? 😄 If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!

steps.sql: SELECT m.id, m.name, SUM(wm.left_number) as remaining_quantity FROM materials m JOIN warehouse_material wm ON m.id = wm.material_id WHERE m.type = 'origin' AND wm.left_number > 0 GROUP BY m.id, m.name;
steps.description: Retrieve the IDs and names of all raw materials (type 'origin') with non-zero inventory in all warehouses
